name: TimeyCap : Student Planner, Schedule & Timetable
description: TimeyCap helps students & pupils to manage their study time for completing their studies successfully. Setting a deadline to your goals, making you more effective and productive, where you do your best work to complete your Homework / Assignments at time.   * Track deadline for assignments / exams due dates. * Settings a deadline for completing your own study goals. * Countdown timer for each goal * Watch your goals in daily / monthly / yearly view * Divide your goals into sub goals / sub tasks * Get applause on goal completion * Create custom categories / tags * Watch your last 7 days progress statistics * Motivational quotes * Priority for each goal (Minor, Medium, Major, Critical) * Option to backup your data locally * Reminder for each goal * Optional Timer Mode for goals (including notification bar updating + alarm at end). * Multiple timers support. * Group multiple sub-tasks into new goal (long press on the sub-goal). * Timetable for week schedule.  Credits: Images in the Homework & Exams sections designed by freepik [https://www.freepik.com/]
